package Arrayconcepts;

public class Demo2 {
	public static void inputs(String name, String job,String pakage) {
		System.out.println("Hai"+""+name+""+job+""+""+pakage);
		
		
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
inputs("john","developer","4LPA");
inputs("hari","Developer","4LPA");


	}

}
